surmount.translation[0].definitions[0].d: to succeed in dealing with a problem or difficulty
surmount.translation[0].definitions[0].e: He has had to surmount immense physical disabilities.
surmount.translation[0].definitions[1].d: to be above or on top of something
surmount.translation[0].definitions[1].e: a tower surmounted by a dome
surmount.translation[0].definitions[1].n: Surmount is usually passive in this meaning
